title: S Rank still not possible for Supports?
body:
So I just played a game on my alt account as Support Soraka, I was 0/4/29 with 22,000 Healing done and 4 cs. Total kills by my team was 35, so an 83% kill participation. I was credited with 4 tower kill assists and helped with 2 drakes. We won.

I got a C-

Thanks Riot, any chance you could one day change the system so that people other than Aggressive roles can get S rank?

replies.body:
the system is against me omg

get good 
or if you think you are already good
get better
then you will get s

Play yorick support. i started playing a him a week and a half ago at lvl 2 mastery and im now lvl 6 with 2 lvl 7 tokens with a pretty high win rate.

 Maybe Try and aim to get as much cs and wards laid as possible, every back buy a pink ward and lay it regardless of whether or not you still have a pink ward down and try and spam your stone wards aswell.If your team is ahead try and split safely to get some cs

oh yeah why is this? why does cs score count as a support when you really shouldn't be taking cs without a relic shield? this feels count-intuitive. Though getting the split gold mid to lategame is really great for rounding off that support build, it's not always the best idea to give this gold to the support rather than say the jungler.

yeah its a really flawed system for supports, basically if you take {{item:3301}} or {{item:3303}}  have to get a crazy number of assists, and keep either a perfect kda, or keep 2 or 3 kills above negative ive found , most people just play carry mages and build 1 support item these days anyway. i rarely play against actual supports anymore

As the current system stands, playing selfishly is the easiest method to get an S.
If you need that S for hextech boxes or a higher mastery then try your hardest not to die, go back alot, don't try to sacrifice yourself so the adc can get a double or even triple kill. Because in the end of the match if you can keep your deaths to 2 or less and still have over 15 assists+kills you are almost always going to get an S. 

For some reason the system doesn't really weigh objective taking or kill participation as heavily as it should and so basically if you want an easy S as a support you will have to be an *sshole.

They need to fix it but it's very achievable. Alternatively, if you don't want to be selfish, play a mage support that fights really farback like zilean, zyra or soraka and ward alot.

Since last patch, I have gotten S and S+ On a variety of supports, I see it as warding as much as possible, getting those assists, saving your ADC and team. A majority of the S Ranks I have received are in games, when I have won lane, got countless assists, which are important, as well as dying for my team in order to secure baron, drag or an ace.{{champion:201}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:117}}

Since this patch i have gotten S and S+ quite regulary with supports. I have done it wil Braun, Thresh and Karma. You just need to keep the wards up and keep your deaths to a minimum and getting a S is definitely achievable.

Yeah I know bro it's frustrating. I have had the same problem. I have been told that the rating system is that you're game is compared with all the other Soraka games played recently and only the top how ever many % get accredited. I personally don't like the system because it has nothing to do with you're actual game and the stronger meta type picks have to work harder than the not so strong meta picks to get a reward. Anyway what can you do.
Riot bases the system on how many soraka supports there are and how good they do. If you play a unpopular champ as support and go like 0/4/29 then it would def be a S
